title: Real-Time Health Alerts Integration
summary: As a full-stack developer creating healthcare applications, I want to implement a webhook system for real-time health alerts so that I can ensure timely notifications for urgent care events and improve response times for elderly users and their caregivers.

title: Comprehensive Developer Documentation – Step-by-Step Integration Guides
summary: As a full-stack developer creating healthcare applications, I want comprehensive developer documentation with step-by-step integration guides so that I can easily build secure and accessible applications that meet healthcare compliance standards and improve the quality of life for elderly users.

title: OAuth-Based Authentication for Third-Party Apps
summary: As a full-stack developer creating healthcare applications, I want an OAuth-based authentication system so that I can ensure secure and compliant access to user data for my applications while maintaining the privacy of elderly users.

title: API Feedback Mechanism
summary: As a full-stack developer creating healthcare applications, I want a feedback mechanism for the ALFRED APIs so that I can efficiently identify and resolve issues while ensuring my applications remain compliant with healthcare regulations.

title: Modular Extension Architecture for Healthcare Applications
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want a modular extension architecture that allows me to easily integrate new features into the ALFRED system so that I can create user-friendly, secure healthcare applications that effectively bridge gaps between elderly users and their caregivers.

title: Error Tracking and Reporting
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to have robust error tracking and reporting tools integrated into the ALFRED system so that I can quickly identify and resolve issues in healthcare applications, ensuring compliance and enhancing user experience.

title: Interoperability with Health Devices
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want pre-built connectors for various health devices so that I can easily integrate real-time health monitoring into my applications for elderly users and caregivers.
